short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark Social Posts to Your EnTribe Content Library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*This extension is intended for users of the EnTribe platform* 

The EnTribe Connect Chrome Extension makes it easy to bookmark your favorite social media posts, request permission from creators for use of their content, and track approval status. The latest version supports Instagram, TikTok, X, and now Youtube. 

How it works:
Open Instagram, TikTok, X, or Youtube, find a post you like, and bookmark it or request rights. The post will be saved to your EnTribe Content Library, trackable and ready for rights requests alongside your other UGC.

What is EnTribe?
EnTribe is the leading software platform that makes it easy for any brand or agency to activate their community to create on-brand video and photo content. With advanced tools to discover content, acquire usage rights, and manage creators, EnTribe enables you to scale your marketing efficiently and authentically. Check out our website to learn more.
